title: One Night Stand Romance
description: One Night Stand Romance is a seductive compilation of over 20 romantic short stories taking peeks into the lives of a vivid cast of characters. One Night Stand is only a delightful play on the short nature of the stories and not the depth of the romance and love contained throughout the narratives of everyday men and women. Individuals seeking love, affection and many times fighting stigmas and harsh realities life sometimes delivers. -A Busy professional formulates an inventive way to keep the spark in his marriage. -A plus-sized wife struggles with insecurities about her husband's happiness. -A wife and her soldier love from different sides of the world. -East Indian lovers avoid arranged marriage for true love.
author: Hombre D. Darby
